sentence.Network_en: Such and such results will follow from such and such causes.

sentence.Network_en: I said, "Well what time'llI get to Leeds?" and he said such and such a time but I missed my connection.
sentence.Network_cn: 我说：“那么我什么时候才能到利兹？”他说了一个时间，但是我没赶上联运车。
